DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: RUIZ DE GAMBOA, U. M.;GAMBOA, U. M. R. DE;MONTEIRO RUIZ DE GAMBOA, ULISSES;RUIZ DE GAMBOA, ULISSES;GAMBOA, ULISSES MONTEIRO RUIZ DE;DE-GAMBOA, ULISSES RUIZ

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduao em Cincia Econmicas e Administrativas - Universidad Gabriela Mistral (1991), Mestrado em Economia pela Pontificia Universidad Catolica de Chile (1994), Doutorado em Economia pela Universidade de So Paulo (2006) e Ps Doutorado em Histria Econmica na University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA), Economista da Associao Comercial de So Paulo e Professor da Fundao Instituto de Pesquisas Econmicas-FIPE-USP e da Fundao Instituto de Administrao - FIA-USP. Tem experincia na rea de Economia e Econometria, com nfase em Finanas Pblicas, Cliometria e Economia de Empresas, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: poltica fiscal, cointegrao, sries de tempo, sustentabilidade da dvida pblica, quebras estruturais, default, economia de empresas..
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: B. A. in Economics and Business at Universidad Gabriela Mistral (1991), M. A. in Economics at Pontificia Universidad Catolica de Chile (1994), Ph.D. in Economics at Universidade de So Paulo (2006) and Post-P.h.D. in Economic History at University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA). Has experience in Economics and Econometrics, focusing on Public Finance, Cliometrics and Managerial Economics, acting on the following subjects: fiscal policy, cointegration, time series, public debt sustainability, structural breaks, default, managerial economics.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Construo de ndices de Liberdade Econmica para os Estados Brasileiros
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Construo de ndices de liberdade econmica para todos os 26 estados brasileiros e para o Distrito Federal para o ano 2016, e, posteriormente, para os anos anteriores a este, no limite da existncia dos dados necessrios. Como objetivos adicionais, espera-se poder traar a evoluo do grau de liberdade econmica dos entes federativos brasileiros atravs do tempo, alm de compar-lo em termos interestaduais, e em relao aos indicadores calculados pelo Fraser Institute para os estados mexicanos, norte-americanos e canadenses. Alm disso, a pesquisa pretende incluir no ndice de liberdade econmica estadual brasileiro variveis associadas ao Sistema Legal e Direitos de Propriedade, a partir da realizao de surveys online a empresrios, aglutinados em torno de associaes gremiais parceiras do Mestrado Profissional em Economia e Mercados, tais como a Associao Comercial de So Paulo (ACSP) e a Associao Brasileira da Indstria Txtil e de Confeco (ABIT), entre outras. A metodologia desses surveys online seguir muito de perto a utilizada pelo Banco Mundial na confeco do ?Doing Business?.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: WHO CAME FIRST: FREEDOM OR PROSPERITY? AN INQUIRY ABOUT LIBERTY AND WELFARE.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: This research proposal aims to explore the relationship between freedom and prosperity by using econometric methodology applied to freedom and prosperity measures developed by the Atlantic Council ? Center for Prosperity. According to Powell (2019), there are strong reasons to believe that the prosperity of a nation is influenced by the institutional environment for private property, such as rule of law, and the degree of freedom for individuals exchange goods and services. Thus, in general, the richest countries have a higher degree of economic freedom. One might think that greater economic freedom would ensure that those entrepreneurs could more easily appropriate the results of their initiative, which would stimulate investment in physical and human capital, in addition to innovation, generating economic growth. Alternatively, the expansion of economic activity could encourage entrepreneurial activity, which for its full development would need to have a greater degree of economic freedom. Thus, the research question that arises is whether economic freedom precedes, in temporal terms, economic growth, or, on the contrary, the increase in GDP precedes the degree of economic freedom. In addition, it is also important to ascertain whether the prosperity of a nation can present a positive and statistically significant relationship with its degree of economic freedom, that is, whether there is a causal relationship in the traditional statistical sense between the two variables.
